metadata.title: Implement Public Slots Endpoint with Query Validation

context.background: This task implements Implement Public Slots Endpoint with Query Validation for Healio and is scoped as one atomic work item aligned to the PRD. It should be completed within 35 mins and leave clear evidence for follow-on tasks.

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; Chrome DevTools MCP GET /api/v1/public/clinics/northview-clinic/slots?date=2026-02-25&serviceId=svc-general-consult (reqid=234); invalid query (reqid=235); unknown service (reqid=236)
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Implemented public slots API route with Zod query validation and standard envelopes, backed by the slot engine. Service layer resolves clinic/service via public booking services and uses fallback operating hours when Prisma is unavailable, with DB operating-hours/appointments support when available. Verified success and negative query/not-found cases via Chrome DevTools MCP.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.

Chrome DevTools MCP verification (reqid=234): valid slots query returned 200 with `{clinicSlug,date,timezone,service,slots[]}` envelope; slot labels/timezone conversion verified for Asia/Manila fallback schedule.
Chrome DevTools MCP verification (reqid=235): invalid query (`date=bad-date`, empty `serviceId`) returned 400 `INVALID_QUERY` with Zod field errors.
Chrome DevTools MCP verification (reqid=236): unknown `serviceId` returned 404 `SERVICE_NOT_FOUND`.
Implementation commit: 39bab49 (feat(healio-booking): add public slots route).
